H0.text: Which Chinese deer, now found only in captivity , was named after a nineteenth century French missionary . Père David's Deer

H1.text: Which Chinese deer, now found only in captivity , was named after a nineteenth century French missionary . Sika Deer

H2.text: Which Chinese deer, now found only in captivity , was named after a nineteenth century French missionary . Chinese Water Deer

H3.text: Which Chinese deer, now found only in captivity , was named after a nineteenth century French missionary . Elaphure

A4.text: Père David's deer was named after Father Armand David by Alphonse Milne-Edwards.

A5.text: The binomial nomenclature Elaphurus davidianus was given by Milne-Edwards, with the species name honoring Father David.
